purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 朴)
Pictophonetic: 菐 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
樸素 [ pǔ sù ]: plain and simple; unadorned; simple living; not frivolous
樸實 [ pǔ shí ]: plain; simple; guileless; down-to-earth; sincere and honest
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 菐 [ pú ] thicket
heisig_chinese_memo: Tree yoga is still just plain yoga, but is on the ground in the forest.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Tree yoga is still just plain yoga, but is on the ground in the forest.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood ", "菐", the original meaning is wood that has not been processed into utensils . "Shuowen": "Lignite. From the wood, the sound of 萐". "Laozi": "Piaosan is a tool, and the saint uses it as a ruler."

" Park " can mean felling and tidying. "Wen Xuan-Zuo Si "Wei Du Fu"": "Zuo Zhe Zhong Dynasty has a servant, listens to politics and sleeps, bandits Pu and gang, go to Thailand to go to great." Li Shan's commentary quoted Kong Anguo saying: "Pu, Zhi."

" Pu " also means essence and nature. "Lao Tzu": "Seeing simple and simple, less selfish and widowed."

" Park " also indicates the cost of goods. "Book of Shang Jun‧ Reclamation Order": "The price of expensive wine and meat, and the rent, make it ten times as simple." Jiang Lihong pointed out: "Park is still the original."

" Pu " also means simple and heavy. "Laozi": "I have no desires, but the people are simple."

" Pu " also refers to bushy trees. "Poetry‧Daya‧Finpu": "Peng Peng Pipu, the salary of the 槱zhi." Mao Chuan: "Pu, Sumuya."

" Pu " can also refer to attachment and attachment. "Book of Shang Jun-Reclamation Order": "If the peasants do not hurt, the traitors are not simple, and the traitors are not simple, the farmers will not be defeated."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood ", "菐", the original meaning is wood that has not been processed into utensils .
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「菐」聲，本義為未經加工成器的木材。《說文》：「木素也。从木，菐聲。」 《老子》：「樸散則為器，聖人用之則為官長。」

　　「樸」可表示砍伐、整理。《文選‧左思〈魏都賦〉》：「左則中朝有赩，聽政作寢，匪樸匪斮，去泰去甚。」李善注引孔安國曰：「樸，治。」

　　「樸」也表示本質、本性。《老子》：「見素抱樸，少私寡欲。」

　　「樸」還表示貨物的成本。《商君書‧墾令》：「貴酒肉之價，重其租，令十倍其樸。」蔣禮鴻錐指：「樸猶本也。」

　　「樸」亦表示樸實、厚重。《老子》：「我無欲，而民自樸。」

　　「樸」也指叢生的樹木。《詩‧大雅‧棫樸》：「芃芃棫樸，薪之槱之。」毛傳：「樸，枹木也。」

　　「樸」還可指附着、依附。《商君書‧墾令》：「農民不傷，姦民無樸，姦民無樸，則農民不敗。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「菐」聲，本義為未經加工成器的木材。

Chinese: Tree yoga is still just plain yoga, but is on the ground in the forest.
Meaning: plain
Hanzi: 朴
Story: Tree yoga is still just plain yoga, but is on the ground in the forest.
Kind: simplified

從「 木 」，「 菐 」聲，本義為未經加工成器的木材。《說文》：「木素也。从木，菐聲。」 《老子》：「樸散則為器，聖人用之則為官長。」 「 樸 」可表示砍伐、整理。《文選‧左思〈魏都賦〉》：「左則中朝有赩，聽政作寢，匪樸匪斮，去泰去甚。」李善注引孔安國曰：「樸，治。」 「 樸 」也表示本質、本性。《老子》：「見素抱樸，少私寡欲。」 「 樸 」還表示貨物的成本。《商君書‧墾令》：「貴酒肉之價，重其租，令十倍其樸。」蔣禮鴻錐指：「樸猶本也。」 「 樸 」亦表示樸實、厚重。《老子》：「我無欲，而民自樸。」 「 樸 」也指叢生的樹木。《詩‧大雅‧棫樸》：「芃芃棫樸，薪之槱之。」毛傳：「樸，枹木也。」 「 樸 」還可指附着、依附。《商君書‧墾令》：「農民不傷，姦民無樸，姦民無樸，則農民不敗。」
From the sound of " wood", " 菐", the original meaning is wood that has not been processed into utensils. "Shuowen": "Lignite. From the wood, the sound of 萐". "Laozi": "Piaosan is a tool, and the saint uses it as a ruler." " Park" can mean felling and tidying. "Wen Xuan-Zuo Si "Wei Du Fu"": "Zuo Zhe Zhong Dynasty has a servant, listens to politics and sleeps, bandits Pu and gang, go to Thailand to go to great." Li Shan's commentary quoted Kong Anguo saying: "Pu, Zhi." " Pu" also means essence and nature. "Lao Tzu": "Seeing simple and simple, less selfish and widowed." " Park" also indicates the cost of goods. "Book of Shang Jun‧ Reclamation Order": "The price of expensive wine and meat, and the rent, make it ten times as simple." Jiang Lihong pointed out: "Park is still the original." " Pu" also means simple and heavy. "Laozi": "I have no desires, but the people are simple." " Pu" also refers to bushy trees. "Poetry‧Daya‧Finpu": "Peng Peng Pipu, the salary of the 槱zhi." Mao Chuan: "Pu, Sumuya." " Pu" can also refer to attachment and attachment. "Book of Shang Jun-Reclamation Order": "If the peasants do not hurt, the traitors are not simple, and the traitors are not simple, the farmers will not be defeated."

樸字的基本解释

樸
pǔ
见“朴1”。

樸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pǔ］
［《廣韻》匹角切，入覺，滂。］
亦作“檏1”。“朴7”的繁体字。
(1)未经加工成器的木材。
(2)砍伐整理。
(3)根。
(4)货物的成本。
(5)本质；本性。
(6)朴实；厚重。
[②]［pú］
［《廣韻》蒲木切，入屋，並。］
［《廣韻》博木切，入屋，幫。］
亦作“檏2”。“朴8”的繁体字。
(1)丛生的树木。
(2)指柞木。参见“樸2桷”。
(3)附着，依附。
[③]［pú］
［《廣韻》薄胡切，平模，並。］
亦作“檏3”。“朴9”的繁体字。
古地名用字。汉置樸县。在今甘肃省古浪县东。

樸字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樸； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页551第28
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?匹角切，音璞。【說文】作檏。木素也。【徐曰】土曰坏，木曰檏。【書·梓材】旣勤樸斲，惟其塗丹臒。　又凡器未成者，皆謂之樸。【爾雅·釋器】木謂之剫，玉謂之雕。【郭註】皆治樸之名。　又質也。【禮·郊特牲】素車之乘，尊其樸也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?博木切，音卜。【詩·大雅】芃芃棫樸。【傳】樸，枹木。【箋】白桵相樸屬而生者。【周禮·冬官考工記】察車之道，欲其樸屬而微至。【註】樸屬，猶附著堅固也。　又【集韻】普木切，音扑。【張衡·東京賦】遵節儉，尚素樸。思仲尼之克己，履老氏之常足。　又堅木也。　又【集韻】步木切，音僕。木密也。　又【廣韻】薄胡切，音蒲。樸?，縣名。【前漢·地理志】屬武威郡。　又【唐韻】普故切，音舖。【淮南子·精神訓】明白太素，無爲復樸。

樸字的源字形

小篆楷体

樸字的起名意思

见“朴”，有淳朴，朴实之义。
